name: Go out for a fancy dinner
rewardMessage: You ran into your boss and became besties. She gave you a bonus of $5000!

name: Perform with your band
rewardMessage: You were discovered!! You signed a record contract with a $50,000 signing bonus!

name: Go to the beach
rewardMessage: You found a gold ring with your metal detector work $1000!

name: Play the lottery
rewardMessage: You won the lottery!! Proceed to early retirement!!!

name: Flipped a coin
rewardMessage: You won the toss and got to keep the $1 coin!
